info.name: Renzo
info.description: April 26th marks the end of Renzo's Season 1 ezPoints campaign, where we've seen immense growth in active users and TVL. Renzo makes restaking ez for everyone! Some highlights from Season 1: $3.5b in deposits, 33.5% Restaking Market Share, Top 10 DeFi protocol by TVL, 250k+ users. Lastly, 2% of the initial 5% airdrop, or 0.1% of the total supply has been allocated to the following communities: Milady Maker, SchizoPosters
